data.comment: The match has started at American Express Community Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chelsea's half?
Brighton to take a throw-in in Chelsea territory.
Timo Werner for Chelsea is whistled offside.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Brighton in the half of Chelsea.
Brighton's Adam Webster misses with an attempt on goal.
Craig Pawson awards Chelsea a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Chelsea in their own half.
In Falmer a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Craig Pawson signals a Chelsea throw-in in Brighton's half.
In the minute 8, Chelsea's Timo Werner is whistled for offside at American Express Community Stadium.
Throw-in for Chelsea at American Express Community Stadium.
Throw-in for Chelsea in the half of Brighton.
In the minute 11, Craig Pawson awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Brighton.
Free kick for Chelsea in their own half.
In the minute 15, Brighton have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
Chelsea awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Chelsea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brighton's half?
In the minute 16, Craig Pawson signals a throw-in for Chelsea, close to Brighton's area.
Craig Pawson signals a Chelsea throw-in in Brighton's half.
Brighton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Chelsea in their own half.
Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Chelsea.
In the minute 21, Brighton have a dangerous throw-in.
Chelsea have been given a penalty at American Express Community Stadium...
Jorginho converts the penalty to give Chelsea a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 25, Steven Alzate (Brighton) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Chelsea drive upfield and Timo Werner gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Brighton defender.
Brighton surge into the attack at American Express Community Stadium but Neal Maupayâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 27, The match at American Express Community Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Tariq Lamptey, who is down injured.
Tariq Lamptey returns to the field for Brighton after picking up a slight injury.
Ball safe as Chelsea is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 29, Ball safe as Brighton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Craig Pawson waits before resuming play because Neal Maupay for Brighton is still down.
Brighton to take a throw-in in Chelsea territory.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Brighton.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Falmer.
Neal Maupay has recovered and rejoins the match in Falmer.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Chelsea in their own half.
Brighton's Steven Alzate gets in a shot on goal at American Express Community Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Brighton push forward at American Express Community Stadium and Solly March gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Chelsea defence.
In the minute 36, Brighton have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Chelsea in their own half.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Chelsea in the half of Brighton.
Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chelsea's half?
Throw-in for Brighton in the half of Chelsea.
In the minute 41, Chelsea to take a throw-in in Brighton territory.
Free kick for Brighton in their own half.
Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Play has been interrupted briefly in Falmer to check on Adam Lallana, who is grimacing with pain.
Craig Pawson will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Craig Pawson signals a Brighton throw-in in Chelsea's half.
In Falmer Chelsea drive forward through Timo Werner. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Brighton in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Chelsea goal kick.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Graham Potter (Brighton) is making a first change, with Aaron Connolly replacing the possibly injured Adam Lallana.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Craig Pawson awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 47, Brighton are coming forward and Aaron Connolly gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Chelsea have a goal kick.
Chelsea needs to be cautious. Brighton have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 48, Aaron Connolly (Brighton) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Tariq Lamptey (Brighton) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
In the minute 50, Throw-in Chelsea.
Throw-in for Brighton in the half of Chelsea.
Throw-in for Chelsea at American Express Community Stadium.
In the minute 54, Chelsea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Leandro Trossard levels the score at 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Tariq Lamptey.
In the minute 56, Goal! Chelsea have got their heads in front thanks to a Reece James strike.
Jorginho instrumental with a fine assist.
Can Brighton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Chelsea's half?
In the minute 58, Goal kick for Chelsea at American Express Community Stadium.
Free kick Brighton.
Brighton's Lewis Dunk attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 59, Ball goes out of play for a Chelsea goal kick.
Free kick for Brighton in their own half.
Chelsea have a goal kick.
In the minute 61, The away team have replaced Ruben Loftus-Cheek with Ross Barkley. This is the first substitution made today by Frank Lampard.
Can Chelsea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brighton's half?
Timo Werner (Chelsea) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 64, Throw-in high up the field for Chelsea in Falmer.
Chelsea's Ross Barkley has run offside.
Brighton to take a throw-in in Chelsea territory.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Chelsea.
Goal! Kurt Zouma extends Chelsea's lead to 1-3.
Great play from Reece James to set up the goal.
In the minute 68, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Craig Pawson signals a Brighton throw-in in Chelsea's half.
Free kick for Brighton in their own half.
In the minute 75, Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Brighton.
Throw-in for Brighton close to the penalty box.
Craig Pawson signals a throw-in for Brighton, close to Chelsea's area.
In the minute 77, Chelsea's Timo Werner gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Brighton defender.
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
Chelsea awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 79, The home team replace Steven Alzate with Alireza Jahanbakhsh.
Brighton make their third substitution with Pascal Gross replacing Ben White.
Throw-in Chelsea.
In the minute 80, Callum Hudson-Odoi is replacing Kai Havertz for Chelsea at American Express Community Stadium.
Aaron Connolly gets his shot on target but fails to score for Brighton.
Free kick for Chelsea in the half of Brighton.
In the minute 81, At American Express Community Stadium, Tariq Lamptey has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Chelsea to take a throw-in in Brighton territory.
Craig Pawson awards Chelsea a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Jorginho is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Ball safe as Brighton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jorginho (Chelsea) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Cesar Azpilicueta.
In the minute 86, It's a goal kick for the away team in Falmer.
Chelsea push upfield but Craig Pawson quickly pulls them for offside.
Can Chelsea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brighton's half?
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Brighton in the half of Chelsea.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Brighton in their own half.
Craig Pawson awards the away team a throw-in.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Falmer.
Goal kick for Chelsea at American Express Community Stadium.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Brighton in their own half.
Ross Barkley for Chelsea drives towards goal at American Express Community Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
That's full-time at American Express Community Stadium. The final score is 1-3.
